Branch facilities

  • Accessibility information
  • Payments: cash, cheques and cards accepted
  • Parking: available
  • Out-of-hours book return available
  • Customer toilet
  • Free sanitary products available
  • Which? available - ask staff for magazine or to log in
  • For sale: I love Rosehill Library wristbands £1

IT and printing facilities

  • Free wifi
  • Book a computer
  • Photocopying: available
  • Colour printing: available
  • Scan to email
  • Printing, photocopying & scanning charges

Regular events and activities

Children's events

Baby Bounce and Tot Rock

Wednesday (term times only), 1415-1445

Songs and rhymes for babies and toddlers.

Find out more about our Bookstart sessions

Craft activities: for primary school age children

Sunday, 1115-1300

East Ipswich Children's Centre: Baby Babble

first, third and fifth Monday of the month, 1030-1130

Please visit the East Ipswich Children's Centre page on Suffolk InfoLink for more information and to book.

East Ipswich Children's Centre: Healthy Child clinic

second and fourth Monday of the month, 1000-1130

Please visit the East Ipswich Children's Centre page on Suffolk InfoLink for more information and to book.

East Ipswich Children's Centre: Baby Massage - book in advance

Monday, 1315-1430

Please visit the East Ipswich Children's Centre page on Suffolk InfoLink for more information and to book.
